ResourceHeader.Description:
Sanikiluaq (SNKQ) Station is located in Sanikiluaq,Nunavut, Canada.  SNKQ is part of the NRCan Network.
    Magnetic Latitude: 65.91
    Magnetic Longitude: 355.85
    UT of Magnetic Midnight: 5.2667
    Magnetic Declination: -16.92
    Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:
GMAG: I. Mann for use of the GMAG data, and the CSA for support of the CARISMA network.
ASI/GBO: S. Mende and E. Donovan for use of the ASI data, and the CSA for logistical support in fielding and data retrieval from the GBO stations
